flawed_nl_solution:
Since Will was 4 years old 3 years ago, then he is 4+3 = <<4+3=7>>7 years old now
Dina is twice as old as he is so she is 2*7 = <<2*7=14>>14 years old now
In 5 years, Will will be 7+5 = <<7+5=12>>12 years old
In 5 years, Diane will be 14+5 = 23 years old
The sum of their ages at that time will be 12+23 = <<12+23=35>>35 years
#### 35

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 23. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
